original: LINDEROTH, Paul Oscar Filip, Bokhandlare, Vingåker, f Skarbjörke, Skedevi s :n, Ögl, 1/5 92 av fabr J O L o Vilhelmina Claesson, gm Rigmor Hansen. Anst fad pappershdl o tryckeri (gr 98) 06, ag dsa 18, då utvidg m bokhdl. Ag fastigh Oskarsborg, Vingåker, vkst dir dta fastigh AB. Resor: Engl, Frankr, Holl, Belg 24, Tjeckoslov, Ital 28, Tyskl, Österr, Ung, Danm, Norge upprep ggr. Sport- o skyt-tegm; Odd Fellow, KAK, Sv Filat.frn, HedL Pojkklb U.D. Hobbies: Sport, friluftsliv, Skytte, filateli, antikviteter, resor, musik o sång, konst, böcker.
translated: LINDEROTH, Paul Oscar Filip, Bookseller, Vingåker, born in Skarbjörke, Skedevi parish, Ögl, on May 1, 1892, son of the factory worker J O L and Vilhelmina Claesson, married to Rigmor Hansen. Employed at his father's paper trading and printing business (since 1898) until 1906, then expanded into book selling. Owns the property Oskarsborg in Vingåker, and also serves as the managing director of a real estate company. Has made multiple trips to England, France, the Netherlands, Belgium (in 1924), Czechoslovakia, Italy (in 1928), Germany, Austria, Hungary, Denmark, and Norway. Member of sports and shooting clubs, Odd Fellow, KAK, Swedish Philatelic Association, HedL Boys' Club, and the U.D. Hobbies: sports, outdoor activities, shooting, philately, antiques, traveling, music and singing, art, books.

employment.name: Father's paper trading and printing business
